LanguageData.Jackalope.label: 뿔토끼
LanguageData.Jackalope.description: A bizarre type of rabbit, seemingly genetically altered to grow surprisingly sharp antlers from its skull.
LanguageData.SnowJackalope.label: 눈 뿔토끼
LanguageData.SnowJackalope.description: A bizarre type of rabbit, seemingly genetically altered to grow surprisingly sharp antlers from its skull.\n\n눈 뿔토끼s are fit to survive incredibly cold temperatures with their plush white fur.
